cu.explanation_en: Setting SCTP_INSTREAMS to 0 (invalid value) will cause SCTP configuration failure as streams must be positive.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofUplinkSymbols to 20 (exceeds maximum allowed symbols) will cause configuration validation failure in the TDD configuration.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofUplinkSymbols 設定為 20（超過最大允許符號數）會在 TDD 配置中導致配置驗證失敗。
